text: Viktor Putyatin (; 12 September 1941 – 2 November 2021) was a Soviet fencer. He won silver medals in the team foil events at the 1968 and 1972 Summer Olympics. Putyatin was born in Kharkiv, Ukrainian SSR, Soviet Union. Putyatin died in Kyiv, Ukraine on 2 November 2021, aged 80.Не стало легенды украинского спорта ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet fencers Category:Sportspeople from Kharkiv
title: Viktor Putyatin
